name: Basketball Stats
description:
IMPROVE YOUR BASKETBALL GAME!

Basketball Stats is the basketball stats app which helps you improve your game.
By measuring your game stats you can put the most effective training plan in place along with gaining insights into what happened in your action packed game.

Save and share stats with your friends and team mates!

Find the secret score combinations to hear the cool sounds to accentuate your game!

How many 2 pointers did you or your team throw?

How many defensive rebounds? offensive ones? It's all there to help you improve your game!

Score (BB Stats) is the fastest way to get accurate personal or team stats and is so easy to use we now find it indispensable! We hope you will too.

This version is for those who want to get in early while its on the low price tier. Upgrades to this version will remain free for early adopters. There3 is some new features coming soon too, but still plenty of reasons to enjoy this app!
